thread.title: Cozy, trendy, little hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Cozy, trendy, little hotel in good location - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kjk152
title: Cozy, trendy, little hotel in good location
text:
Nice hotel with super friendly and helpful staff. The hotel has a good location and our room was quiet. The only minus was that the rooms are small ( but well it is Manhattan). The hotel is smallish and cozy and not noisy but still is rather vibrant with a popular restaurant and bar. A positive experience!
y, not noisy but still managing
